function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Resilient residential model for pandemic adaptation","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing strict sanitation protocols, promoting social distancing, and improving ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV sterilization systems, smart building management systems, and contactless technology","People":"Residents, visitors, and building staff","Owner":"Building owners, property managers, and local authorities"}]}
